title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS

text: Okay, here we go. .Okay, let's see. Looks like if we cut here, and here...

text: ...vein right, well-  Well, here goes nothing. Help me pull his pajamas up. No way! Kidney Blocker 2000?!

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: whatwhatwhatwhat?  Oh, it's Stan and Butters! Trying to take my kidney, are you?!

text: You suck, Cartman!

text: Maybe so, but at least I was smart enough to wear a Kidney Blocker 2000!

text: God-damnit, don't you care that Kyle is gonna die?!

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: I do! I do care! Look how much.  Look. Look how much I care.

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Mr. Garrison has finished his novel and is now inside talking to a publisher

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: First and foemost, Mr. Garrison, I would like to thank you for chosing Harequin Romance

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Yeahyeahyeah. So, didi you read the book?

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Uh yes, Mr. Garrison, we did read your book.

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Well, what did you think?

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Well, uh, frankly, Mr. Garrison, n-we don't know if the Harequin Romance label is appropriate for you.

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Ooohhh, why not??

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Mr. Garrison, uh... are you aware that the word "penis" occurs six-thousand and eighty-three times in your novel?

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Well, I'm sure there's lots of naughty words. It is a romance novel.

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Nnnno, I don't think that this book really qualifies as a "romance novel."

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: No?

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: No. No, this is what we in the book-publishing business like to call... gay. Really, really gay.

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: What the hell are you talkin' about?!

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: It's just that the focus really seems to be on the... male organs.

text: Well, I thought it was mostly women that read these things!

text: It is.

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Well, women want to read about ding-dongs! D'you thnk women care about the details of female anatomy?! Hel-lo! Women wanna read about big, poweful schlongs!  Look, I've seen women read these things. They skim along and skim along until they get to the part about the penis! That's what they want, so that's what I'm giving them!

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Hmmm.

text: There's nothing more I can do, Kenny. I've tried everything to save Kyle. Holistic medicine is gonna kill my friend!

text: Four dozen Cherokee hair tampons, please.

text: Hi, uh, I have a little bit of pain in my balls whenever I watch VH1.

text: Hmm?

text: No, man, that kid needs a doctor! And besides, we're not actually Native Americans. I mean, I'm I'm more like a, a Mexican.

text: Hell's Pass Hospital, some hours later. Dr. Doctor is in his office.

text: Doctor, Eric Cartman is here-

text: Why, hello there, Eric.

text: You see that?! That's MINE! My asshole friend Stan took my kidney, and I need it put back in!  Please.

title: CHEROKEE HAIR TAMPONS
text: Hell's Pass Hospital, still later. Cartman and Kyle are in the recovery room surrounded by their parents. Stan and his parents are there, too. Balloons, a smiley-face and two banners, "I HOPE YOU GET BETTER!" and "GET WELL SOON", decorate Kyle's side of the room

text: It was all a trick. Your mom undid the kidney blocker, and then we put catchup on your bed so you'd think we took your kidney.

text: Boys, I have an announcement to make: I'm not gonna be your teacher anymore. I've become a best-selling author! And Kyle, I want you to have a signed copy as a get-well present.
